definition: exactly what one wants
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
surname Huai

sentences.english: His father let him take the entrance exam for the military academy, which is just what he wanted.
sentences.chinese: 他父親讓他報考軍校，對他來說真是正中下懷。

sentences.english: Thank you for the gift which is just after my own heart.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你給我們的禮物，這是正中下懷。
